titles.title: A bill for the relief of Oscar H. McCormack.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.
Reported to House by House Committee on The Judiciary. Report No: 100-870.
Called up by House on Call of Private Calendar.
Passed Over by House Without Prejudice.
Called up by House on Call of Private Calendar.
Recommitted by House to House Committee on The Judiciary by Virtue of Objection Made on Call of Private Calendar.

bill.summary: 3/5/1987--Introduced. Relieves a named individual of liability for repayment to the United States of an unspecified sum representing salary overpayments to such individual which occurred while he was an employee of the Department of Agriculture. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay to such individual any amount paid by him or withheld from accounts otherwise due to him with respect to such indebtedness to the United States.
